revised_title: Albert James Bradley's Contributions to Crystallography and X-ray Diffraction
tldr: Albert James Bradley was a prominent crystallographer who made significant contributions to the field of X-ray diffraction and crystal structure determination. He worked on both single-crystal and powder methods, solving complex structures like α-manganese and y-brass. His research on pseudo-symmetry and lattice parameters helped advance the understanding of metallic states and crystal structures.
